Full Stack Developer & Software Engineer

I build modern web applications with Ruby on Rails, React, and cloud technologies. Passionate about creating scalable solutions, implementing security best practices, and delivering exceptional user experiences for government agencies and businesses.

About Me

I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building web applications that make a difference. Currently working as a Software Engineer at LexisNexis Risk Solutions, I specialize in Ruby on Rails, React, and cloud infrastructure development.

I founded Ventura Coast Web Design LLC, where I deliver modern, responsive websites and enhanced Google Business presence for local clients. I'm passionate about security-first development, CI/CD pipelines, and creating scalable solutions that solve real-world problems.
